import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { fetchCategories } from "../../redux/slices/categoriesSlice"; const Categories = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const categories = useSelector((state) => state.categories.categories); useEffect(() => { const fectedData = async () => { await dispatch(fetchCategories()); }; fectedData(); }, []); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(""); const [filteredData, setFilteredData] = useState([]); const [taskForm, setTaskForm] = useState({ task: "", project: "", description: "", startDate: "", endDate: "", priority: "", }); const [taskExists, setTaskExists] = useState(false); const [showPopup, setShowPopup] = useState(false); const [selectedManagerId, setSelectedManagerId] = useState(null); const [personnelChecked, setPersonnelChecked] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { setFilteredData(data.tasks); }, [data.tasks]); const filterData = () => { const filtered = data.tasks.filter((task) => task.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); setFilteredData(filtered); }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setTaskForm({ ...taskForm, [name]: value }); }; const handleCheckboxChange = (id, isChecked) => { setPersonnelChecked({ ...personnelChecked, [id]: isChecked }); }; const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Implement form submission logic }; const handleUpdateSubmit = () => { // Implement update logic }; const handleDelete = () => { // Implement delete logic }; const showHiddenAdd = () => { setShowPopup(!showPopup); }; return (
{showHiddenAdd()}
